main.name: Eric Ambriza
main.bio: I’m a young man, full of dreams… I have Honors degree in Computer Science and I also have a partial MBA in oil and gas. I also have a Nanodegree in Data Analysis at Udacity and a CAPM exam preparation at Udemy.
